Text:

You need to bun the image (.iso) to a DVD or CD with a program I included (well I think I did) Imgburn. Then you should be good to go.
detect as bootable minor virus by XSE power anti virus

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6290255/Windows_XP_Pro_SP2_USB_Edition

son of a bitch i had wrote out a long ass message praising you for your work and then  my login timed out and i thought i had copied it first but obviously it was the link to the page i had copied lol.

But anyway it works perfectly just follow the instruction that the poster took the time to write out and your good to go.

Great work saved me the headache of making myself a new one.

to Bad_Case,

My problem is I cant install the Network drivers in Safemode. Is there anny way i can bypass that?
Yes i did. Think the only problem is the Network drivers i cant install in Safemode. Any way to do that?

KillFrenZ: Then how old are your PC?
